name: Axion ST Real-Data Validation
description: Validation of axion suppression factor (ST) uncertainty reduction on real topological data.

hypothesis.H0: Geometric invariants on real data do not reduce ST uncertainty to Delta log10(ST) <= 2 or R2 < 0.5.
hypothesis.H1: Non-linear geometric models on real data achieve Delta log10(ST) <= 2 and R2 >= 0.5.

data_requirements.description: Real topological invariants (Volume, Determinant) from topology_assignments.json.

test_method: Gaussian Process Regression (GPR) and Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation (LOO-CV).
